item.title: About us - Management
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482399845614{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="33"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482399938520{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Leading Management Consulting Company" subtitle="COMPANY OVERVIEW"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482399899479{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"]ConsultingPress is a leading management consulting company with over 15 years of experience in tax consulting, global expansion and acquisition consulting and strategy & growth consulting. ConsultingPress has built it’s expertise on high-skilled management consulting specialists, each in their own field of management consulting niche.
We offer consulting services in various industry sectors including aerospace and defense, energy and chemicals, transportation and logistics, communications, banking and finance and education and non-profit industry sector.
Here in ConsultingPress we offer our clients wide range of consulting services including business strategy and growth consulting, global expansion consulting, audit and assurance, customer strategy creation and consulting, tax related consulting services and mergers and acquisitions consulting. We help you understand global laws and practices.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_feature_box style="feature-box" title="Our mission" text="Helping companies grow by defining their business goals and steps item.title: Dividers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482824941562{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482824910604{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"]
Custom dots divider
This is example of custom divider in shape of three dots. It is perfect for dividing your content in a beautiful way. Perfect to use on home and intro pages as it adds some custom, unique feel to your page. It's clean and simple, yet it divides your content in nice way and adds a bit of designers touch to the site. Of course we made some other, simpler dividers you can use on any of your pages. To use a divider, simply add it in a row and full width column inside that row. To use this type of divider just use class "divider".[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482825384714{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825393079{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
Simple Line divider
This is example of a simple line divider that divides rows of your content. You can use it on any of your pages, home page or inner pages. To use it, add it in a single row, full width column. Inside of it place a divider element, style line. SImple![/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-line"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482825435126{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825404905{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
Divider dotted
This is example of a simple dotted divider that divides rows of your content. You can use it on any of your pages, home page or inner pages. To use it, add it in a single row, full width column. Inside of it place a div with class "divider-dotted".[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-dotted"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482825445460{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825415002{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
Custom icon divider
You can use any of the FontAwesome or Lynny Icons Font icons in this divider. You can use it on any of your pages, home page or inner pages. To use it, add it in a single row, full width column.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-icon" icon_type="icon_lynny" icon_lynny="lynny-building-2" design_param=".vc_custom_1483001615890{margin-top: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482826288333{margin-bottom: 120px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1482825422816{margin-bottom: 110px !important;}"]
To top divider
This is example of to top icon. Normally it is already included in ConsultingPress. You can see it when scrolling down. It appears on the right bottom side of the page. However you may need this element on specific position or specific page, so we decided to include it.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider-scroll-up"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Accordion
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Accordion Default Style" subtitle="SIMPLE ACCORDION FOR YOUR PAGES"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-default" color="" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Why management consulting?" tab_id="1477391280657-4ba7f951-bdca"][vc_column_text]
Every business sector has it's specific regulations and practices and needs to be examined carefully. We have wide experience in wide range of industry sectors like automotive, transportation and logistics, energetics and more. For every specific industry sector we have dedicated consultants team.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How can I join ConsultingPress Team?" tab_id="1477391280692-04b41938-d83c"][vc_column_text]
You are management consulting expert or want to become one of them? Then please submit your CV and cover letter through job application for on our careers page as we are always looking for fresh talent to join our team.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which areas of Tax consulting do you cover?" tab_id="1480088985228-82abf3c6-6c15"][vc_column_text]
We cover three areas of tax consulting: cost segregation, federal tax matters and income tax accounting.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which areas of Mergers and Acquisitions do you cover?" tab_id="1483616753500-458d0558-4328"][vc_column_text]If you need mergers and acquisitions consultant you came on the right place. We will help you define acquisition strategy, communications strategy and post-merger integration.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-default" color="#071740" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Why management consulting?" tab_id="1483615938416-04b73bcc-903b"][vc_column_text]
Every business sector has it's specific regulations and practices and needs to be examined carefully. We have wide experience in wide range of industry sectors like automotive, transportation and logistics, energetics and more. For every specific industry sector we have dedicated consultants team.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How can I join ConsultingPress Team?" tab_id="1483615938507-3f617a57-7264"][vc_column_text]
You are management consulting expert or want to become one of them? Then please submit your CV and cover letter through job application for on our careers page as we are always looking for fresh talent to join our team.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which areas of Tax consulting do you cover?" tab_id="1483615938600-8a21ad12-8acc"][vc_column_text]
We cover three areas of tax consulting: cost segregation, federal tax matters and income tax accounting.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which areas of Mergers and Acquisitions do you cover?" tab_id="1483616870120-67f98469-af30"][vc_column_text]If you need mergers and acquisitions consultant you came on the right place. We will help you define acquisition strategy, communications strategy and post-merger integration.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Accordion Boxed Style" subtitle="ACCORDION BOXED STYLE, USED ON FAQ PAGE"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-boxed" color="" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="What do you do in ConsultingPress?" tab_id="1477391365631-111b0fd4-196f"][vc_column_text]
ConsultingPress is a leading management consulting company with over 15 years of experience in tax consulting, global expansion and acquisition consulting and strategy & growth consulting. ConsultingPress has built it’s expertise on high-skilled management consulting specialists, each in their own field of management consulting niche.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Why management consulting?" tab_id="1477391365704-2e3fe252-4c9c"][vc_column_text]Every business sector has it's specific regulations and practices and needs to be examined carefully. We have wide experience in wide range of industry sectors like automotive, transportation and logistics, energetics and more. For every specific industry sector we have dedicated consultants team.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which industry sectors do you serve?" tab_id="1480089281821-684fb275-f67c"][vc_column_text]We serve wide range of industry sectors, including: aerospace and defense, energy and chemicals, transportation and logistics, banking, renewable resources, consumer goods, travel and tourism, industrial products and education and non-profit[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-boxed" color="#071740" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="What do you do in ConsultingPress?" tab_id="1482839001508-743ffdbd-c43f"][vc_column_text]
ConsultingPress is a leading management consulting company with over 15 years of experience in tax consulting, global expansion and acquisition consulting and strategy & growth consulting. ConsultingPress has built it’s expertise on high-skilled management consulting specialists, each in their own field of management consulting niche.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Why management consulting?" tab_id="1482839001588-27cb6d8a-521d"][vc_column_text]Every business sector has it's specific regulations and practices and needs to be examined carefully. We have wide experience in wide range of industry sectors like automotive, transportation and logistics, energetics and more. For every specific industry sector we have dedicated consultants team.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which industry sectors do you serve?" tab_id="1482839001676-5ab9e2a9-4eb7"][vc_column_text]We serve wide range of industry sectors, including: aerospace and defense, energy and chemicals, transportation and logistics, banking, renewable resources, consumer goods, travel and tourism, industrial products and education and non-profit[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Our history
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482400677031{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="554"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Company history" subtitle="About"][vc_column_text]ConsultingPress is 15 years in management consulting business, started by two enthusiasts it grew to team of 20 high-skilled management consulting specialists. Here is how we started.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_company_timeline param_group="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_fontawesome%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-calendar%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-boat%22%2C%22title%22%3A%222001.%20Building%20the%20foundations%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22ConsultingPress%20is%2015%20years%20in%20management%20consulting%20business%2C%20started%20by%20two%20enthusiasts%20it%20grew%20to%20team%20of%2020%20high-skilled%20management%20consulting%20specialists.%20Here%20is%20how%20we%20started.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_fontawesome%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-calendar%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-boat%22%2C%22title%22%3A%222003.%20First%20expansion%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22In%202003.%20ConsultingPress%20expanded%20their%20team%20with%20four%20management%20consulting%20experts.%20As%20there%20were%20more%20and%20more%20complex%20projects%20we%20needed%20right%20people%20to%20do%20the%20job.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_fontawesome%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-calendar%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-boat%22%2C%22title%22%3A%222008.%20Global%20coverage%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22In%202008.%20we%20opened%20ten%20new%20offices%20on%20three%20continents%20expanding%20our%20partnership%20and%20team%20network%20of%20management%20consulting%20specialists%20with%20wide%20range%20of%20experience%20in%20various%20industry%20sectors.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_fontawesome%22%2C%22icon_fontawesome%22%3A%22fa%20fa-calendar%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-boat%22%2C%22title%22%3A%222016.%20Leading%20management%20consulting%20company%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22ConsultingPress%20become%20awarded%20international%20consulting%20company%20and%20a%20leader%20in%20it%E2%80%99s%20field.%20We%20developed%20into%20powerful%20company%20based%20upon%20best%20management%20consulting%20specialists%20and%20powerful%20global%20connections%20and%20partnerships.%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Our team
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-management%2Four-team%2Fteam-member%2F|||" image="559" title="CEO & FOUNDER" name="Joshua Turner" bio=""]Joshua is CEO and founder of ConsultingPress.
Joshua has been in consulting business for over 20 years. After working in large consulting agency for five years, Joshua recognized the need for management consultants and decided to grow his experience in that direction.[/volcanno_team_member][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-management%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-page-patrick%2F|||" image="565" title="PRINCIPAL" name="Patrick Murray" bio=""]Patrick has 15 years of experience in management consulting with major expertise in tax consulting. Prior to becoming a principal in ConsultingPress, Patrick worked in Trucking Ltd governing tax consulting department. Patrick joined ConsultingPress in 2004.[/volcanno_team_member][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-management%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-page-ashley%2F|||" image="1065" title="TAX CONSULTANT" name="Ashley Valdez" bio=""]Ashley Valdez is tax consultant specialist with expertise in cost segregation, federal tax matters and income tax accounting. Ashley has 10 years of experience in management and tax consulting. Ashley joined ConsultingPress in 2009. and since then has been working on cost segregation consulting, federal tax matters consulting and income tax consulting.[/volcanno_team_member][volcanno_team_member href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-management%2Four-team%2Fteam-member-brandon-lucas%2F|||" image="1069" title="MANAGEMENT CONSULTANT" name="Brandon Lucas" bio=""]Brandon Lucas is specialist in management consulting, mergers and acquisitions field. Brandon joined ConsultingPress in 2005. and since then has been working with clients from three different continents. He is management consulting specialist with wide experience in mergers and acquisitions.[/volcanno_team_member][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Job listing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482402158973{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%22586%22%2C%22caption%22%3A%22I%20am%20very%20enthusiastic%20about%20my%20work%2C%20mainly%20because%20I%20work%20in%20creative%20and%20positive%20environment%20with%20some%20amazing%20people.%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22Ashley%20Valdez%2C%20Online%20Marketing%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%236ec25b%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%22588%22%2C%22caption%22%3A%22I've%20learned%20a%20lot%20in%20these%20few%20years%20in%20ConsultingPress.%20Among%20all%2C%20the%20importance%20of%20good%20management%20structure.%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22Patrick%20Murray%2C%20Principal%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%236ec25b%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%22587%22%2C%22caption%22%3A%22Working%20in%20ConsultingPress%20is%20great.%20It's%20all%20about%20team%20effort.%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22Brandon%20Lucas%2C%20Marketing%20Specialist%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%236ec25b%22%7D%5D" width="750" height="396" title_size="nivo-slider-01"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Work for ConsultingPress"][vc_column_text]Here at ConsultingPress, we are always looking for fresh talents. ConsultingPress is a leading management consulting company with offices around the world. Our team is comprised of high-skilled management consultants including tourism consultants, tax consultants, management consultants and logistics and transportation consultants. If you have passion for all things management consulting related you might be the perfect person for us. We work with interns, volunteers and consultants around the world, so no matter where you are from, we might have a job opportunity just for you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_video link="https://vimeo.com/144656411?color=ff5500"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Who are we looking for" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]We always look for creative and enthusiastic people to join our team. You simply must be passionate about your job and everything else will come along. You can check available job positions, or open an open letter. We are looking forward to meeting you![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Opened job positions" title_size="h3"][volcanno_table]

[/volcanno_table][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Frequently Asked Questions" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Here a re a list of some frequently asked questions by our clients. if you don’t find the answer you seek, please feel free to contact us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion style="consulting-press-boxed" color="#6ec25b" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="What do you do in ConsultingPress?" tab_id="1479380572185-7af5bf78-e0b7"][vc_column_text]ConsultingPress is a leading management consulting company with over 15 years of experience in tax consulting, global expansion and acquisition consulting and strategy & growth consulting.
ConsultingPress has built it’s expertise on high-skilled management consulting specialists, each in their own field of management consulting niche.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Why management consulting?" tab_id="1479380572204-6e0cbeb5-490f"][vc_column_text]Every business sector has it's specific regulations and practices and needs to be examined carefully. We have wide experience in wide range of industry sectors like automotive, transportation and logistics, energetics and more. For every specific industry sector we have dedicated consultants team.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which industry sectors do you serve?" tab_id="1479380659146-4e0c8786-3c2c"][vc_column_text]We serve wide range of industry sectors, including: aerospace and defense, energy and chemicals, transportation and logistics, banking, renewable resources, consumer goods, travel and tourism, industrial products and education and non-profit[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How can I join ConsultingPress Team?" tab_id="1480073062948-598a9de0-4e24"][vc_column_text]You are management consulting expert or want to become one of them? Then please submit your CV and cover letter through job application for on our careers page as we are always looking for fresh talent to join our team.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which areas of Tax consulting do you cover?" tab_id="1480073128886-e040c4f5-fdef"][vc_column_text]We cover three areas of tax consulting: cost segregation, federal tax matters and income tax accounting.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Which areas of Mergers and Acquisitions do you cover?" tab_id="1480073178444-b7d6e6c6-b6ed"][vc_column_text]If you need mergers and acquisitions consultant you came on the right place. We will help you define acquisition strategy, communications strategy and post-merger integration.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482493859793{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2807"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482493675339{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Aerospace and defense" subtitle="INDUSTRY SECTORS"][vc_column_text]ConsultingPress serves both small and large companies in private and public sector. We provide full stack of services for aviation and defense industry including business strategy definition, mergers and acquisitions and some industry sector specific services like aerospace services, defense manufacturing, repair and maintenance in aviation industry.
Aviation industry is growing fast in the last few years. We will help you grow your business and increase productivity and on-time delivery using our professional guidance.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Rely on ConsultingPress for:" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list list_style="detailed" param_group_detailed="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-checkmark-2%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Performance%20Improvement%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22We'll%20provide%20you%20the%20tools%20for%20efficient%20supply%20chain%20management%2C%20market%20segmentation%2C%20cost%20optimization%20and%20increase%20cash%20flow.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-checkmark-2%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Advisory%20services%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22We%20will%20help%20you%20in%20most%20challenging%20business%20practices%20like%20mergers%20and%20acquisitions%2C%20due%20diligence%20and%20global%20expansions.%20Our%20team%20of%20experts%20will%20guide%20you%20through%20every%20activity.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-checkmark-2%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Risk%20management%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22ConsultingPress%20will%20provide%20you%20with%20tools%20for%20risk%20assessment%20in%20financial%20and%20supply%20chain%20areas%20and%20risk%20mitigation.%20You%20worry%20about%20your%20core%20business%2C%20we'll%20take%20care%20of%20the%20risk%20management.%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Typography
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000811368{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h1 Heading

This is example of standard h2 heading. The best practice for SEO purposes is to have one h1 heading on your page. For example you can use it on your page title, like we did in this template.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000816666{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h2 Heading

This is example of standard h2 heading. It is used for all major headings on your page. For example the page name is Services. This will be h1 heading. After that you have specific service called "Consulting". This will be h2 heading.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000821578{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h3 Heading

This is example of h3 heading. According to our previous heading standard, on services page you have main service called "Consulting". Then of course you have different fields of consulting, like "Tourism Consulting". That will be heading h3.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000830057{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

h4 Heading

This is example of standard h4 heading. It is used for less important headlines. The basic rule is to follow hierarchy. So for example you have service "Tourism Consulting", like we mentioned previously. If you have different services for that main service and you are showing them on that same page, the heading of that services should be h4.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483000834726{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
h5 Heading
This is example of standard h5 heading. It is used for some small elements on the page, less important elements. Where you will use it will depend on structure of your page and how many main sections and subsections you have.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]
h6 Heading
This is example of standard h6 heading. It is used for some small elements on the page, less important elements. Where you will use it will depend on structure of your page and how many main sections and subsections you have.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Custom heading style 01" subtitle="CUSTOM HEADINGS"][vc_column_text]This is example of custom heading style 01. It has small title on the top and main title on the bottom. Perfect for showcasing small amount of content. It is left aligned and fits perfectly on any page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Center aligned custom heading" subtitle="CUSTOM HEADINGS"][vc_column_text]This is example of custom heading style 02. It is center aligned, title is in focus on first place, and you also have subtitle where you can describe what that section is about. It can be only two words, or maybe two sentences.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Custom heading style 03"][vc_column_text]This is example of custom heading style 02. It is center aligned, title is in focus on first place, and you also have subtitle where you can describe what that section is about. It can be only two words, or maybe two sentences.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Blockquote

This is example of a blockquote. You can use it for your company mission and vision statement or on a page showcasing some authors quote.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_blockquote author="- ColorByt"]"I always love when you upload something new. Your attention to detail, uniqueness and story driven design is a joy to explore. Every pixel is there for a reason, nothing is generic, and it all works great together. Truly an inspiration to look p to, and steal from."[/volcanno_blockquote][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_divider divider_style="divider"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Text element

This is simple p tag. Here we will show you different styling for text element you can use. For example this is bold text. There is sometimes a need to color the text. We did it in theme colors. This is how it looks. You may have a need to color the background of the text, that is to highlight something important. This is highlighted text.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Code element

This is one of the standard HTML elements.[/vc_column_text][volcanno_raw_code code="alF1ZXJ5JTI4ZG9jdW1lbnQlMjkucmVhZHklMjhmdW5jdGlvbiUyMCUyOCUyNCUyOSUyMCU3QiUwQSUyMCUyMCUyMCUyMCUyN3VzZSUyMHN0cmljdCUyNyUzQiUwQSUyMCUyMCUyMCUyMCUyRiUyRiUyMFlvdXIlMjBjb2RlJTIwZ29lcyUyMGhlcmUlMEElN0QlMjklM0IlMjAlMjA="][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Pricing tables
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-02" title="Pricing Tables Design" subtitle="SIMPLE PRICING TABLES"][vc_column_text]

It's well known that most consulting companies do not charge fixed fees. The pricing is based on project basis. However, there could be a need for featuring some kind of prices, like paid seminars or case studies, so we decided to include this element in ConsultingPress.

item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="What Our Clients Say About Us" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]We pay attention to details and quality, good communication and strong customer relationship. Here is what they say about us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482406228565{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``I always love when you upload something new. Your attention to detail, uniqueness and story driven design is a joy to explore. Every pixel is there for a reason, nothing is generic, and it all works great together. Truly an inspiration to look p to, and steal from :)``" author="ColorByt" href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fpixel-industry.com%2F|||" href_text="Web Designer"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482406235955{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``Really happy with the guidance you provided. Our employees are now more aware of their role in information security and management of IT is much efficient now.``" author="Vladimir Mrkela" href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fpixel-industry.com%2F|||" href_text="PIXEL INDUSTRY Ltd."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482406245288{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``Just wanted to thank Consulting Press for providing exceptional Tourism consulting service to our company. Investing in sustainable tourism proves to be really well decision.``" author="Scott Rogers" href="url:%23|||" href_text="Poleo Digital"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482406262559{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``I don’t purchase themes lightly...this theme is awesome! Lots of nice features. The content manager is very good, it takes a small while just to get used to the format but overall its really good. The support is great and with a fast response, with helpful answers and solutions to my personal preferences. Just buy it, you wont regret it :)``" author="sboyle" href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fpixel-industry.com%2F|||" href_text="Elvyre Retina Ready WordPress Theme"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_testimonial style="testimonial-style-02" text="``... The end product is one of the most solid web experiences we have seen on ThemeForest though we are still doing more testing. The functionality, user interface, and customization of features is extremely high end. We keep telling our client that Elvyre is what a ”$20,000 website looks like” – everyone is very psyched about it.....``" author="DigitalMarketingAssociates" href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fpixel-industry.com%2F|||" href_text="Elvyre Retina Ready WordPress Theme"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][volcanno_single_image image="624"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Linked Supply Chain

Linked Supply Chain is logistics and transportation consulting company in Germany. They have been our partners for seven years. Their expertise in logistics and transportation and our expertise in management consulting results in complete solution for every company that needs logistics and transportation consulting services. For more information visit linkedsupplychain.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][volcanno_single_image image="621"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Travel Deals

Travel Deals is travel deals coupon site promoting less known destinations, their natural environment and cultural heritage. They have been our partners for tourism consulting for seven years now. For more information visit traveldeals.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][volcanno_single_image image="625"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

SecureCam

SecureCam is small IT Security company based in New York, USA. They have wide experience in IT Security development and management. SecureCam has been our partner for 5 years providing exceptional IT Security Consulting services for our clients. For more information visit securecam.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][volcanno_single_image image="623"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Travel Portugal

Travel Portugal is one of our tourism consulting partners, base in Portugal. They provide tourism development consulting, tourism marketing consulting and tourism education and training consulting. For more information visit travelportugal.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_feature_box style="boxed-background" icon_type="icon_lynny" icon_lynny="lynny-pages-1" icon_color="#6ec25b" title="Want to partner up with us?" text="Become one of our partners and help us share the vision of successful finance consulting and it's value for companies around the world." href="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdemo.pixel-industry.com%2Fconsultingpress%2Fhome-management%2Fcontact-simple%2F|||" read_more="Contact us"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

It's well known that most consulting companies do not charge fixed fees. The pricing is based on project basis. However, there could be a need for featuring some kind of prices, like paid seminars or case studies, so we decided to include this element in ConsultingPress.

[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482414705534{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%22758%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Developing%20a%2010-Year%20Business%20Strategy%20for%20MixLogistics%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22View%20Case%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%236ec25b%22%2C%22href%22%3A%22url%3A%2523%7C%7C%7C%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221150%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Merger%20Integration%20Planning%20and%20Execution%20Process%20in%20Alura%20%26%20Partners%22%2C%22subtext%22%3A%22View%20Case%22%2C%22subtext_color%22%3A%22%236ec25b%22%2C%22href%22%3A%22url%3A%2523%7C%7C%7C%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482414777177{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading title="Mergers & Acquisitions" subtitle="WHAT WE DO"][vc_column_text]Mergers and acquisitions are great way of expanding your business to new markets, gaining new valuable personnel, and optimizing current market positions. However, mergers and acquisitions can be quite challenging socially for companies that have no experience in this field. ConsultingPress will help you in business and finance decision making that will help you maximize gain and reduce potential risks in mergers and acquisitions process.
With more than 150.000 Mergers and acquisition related projects across wide range of industry sectors, ConsultingPres will guide you through even most complex mergers and acquisitions. Our broad expertise include development of mergers and acquisitions strategy, strategic due diligence and merger integration planning and execution.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row However, mergers and acquisitions can be quite challenging socially for companies that have no experience in this field. ConsultingPress will help you in business and finance decision making that will help you maximize gain and reduce potential risks in mergers and acquisitions process.
With more than 150.000 Mergers and acquisition related projects across wide range of industry sectors, ConsultingPres will guide you through even most complex mergers and acquisitions. Our broad expertise include development of mergers and acquisitions strategy, strategic due diligence and merger integration planning and execution.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row Your company strategy must be in alliance with newly created merger and acquisition strategy. We will help you define clear merger strategy that will be flexible enough and result in maximum chances for successful merger or acquisition.
Mergers and acquisitions are great way of expanding your business to new markets, gaining new valuable personnel, and optimizing current market positions. However, mergers and acquisitions can be quite challenging socially for companies that have no experience in this field. ConsultingPress will help you in business and finance decision making that will help you maximize gain and reduce potential risks in mergers and acquisitions process.
With more than 150.000 Mergers and acquisition related projects across wide range of industry sectors, ConsultingPres will guide you through even most complex mergers and acquisitions. Our broad expertise include development of mergers and acquisitions strategy, strategic due diligence and merger integration planning and execution.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row
